Posts.Content: May 14, 2008 07:24PM cetn wrote: What treatments are you receiving with the bone mets???
Posts.Title: False Negative Sentinal node/Lactation cetn cetn

Posts.Content: cetn wrote: I was DX with Invasive Ductal Carcinoma at age 38 while Nursing my 8 month old Baby.  In 2005.  Had L Lumpectomy with Sentinal node bx that was Negative.  I nursed right up to the morning of surgery.  I was not going to allow Cancer to take that time away from my Baby and I. 1.6 CM, ER PR Positive, HER 2 Negative.  6 cycles of FEC.  Half way through Chemo I had a repeat Mammogram to see if any changes now that I was no longer Lactating.  DCIS found in same breast so a Mastectomy was performed after Chemo.  I started Tamoxifan and have been seeing my Oncologist every 4 months for almost 3 years.  2008, I find a lump in Left Axilla which turns out to be Cancer (same as original Tumor).  8 out of 13 positive nodes with a metastatic lesion on T4 Vertabrae.  What a SHOCK!!  My Docs are just as shocked as all my blood work etc.. was normal.  I am on Zometa and  Femara.  I had the Cyberknife to my spine and am receiving radiation to left chest wall. My question is:  Are there any women who have had a false negative Sentinal Node or were Pregnant or Lactating at the time of surgery?  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: False Negative Sentinal node/Lactation cetn cetn

Posts.Content: May 14, 2008 08:10PM cetn wrote: I also had Vascular Invasion noted on Path report.  I had 6 rounds of FEC and double MAstectomy.  Perhaps we both fall under the catergory of a false negative sentinal node. Sorry to hear about your Mom... it is such a SHOCK to go from Stage 1 to Metastatic .  What treatments is she getting?
Posts.Title: False Negative Sentinal node/Lactation cetn cetn
